label: Archive Records
description: GraphQL queries for DDR archive records - comprehensive metadata for ML training validation

presets.label: All media items
presets.description: ALL media items individually (unpacked from parent records) - complete metadata for ML training
presets.query:
# All media items - COMPLETE METADATA for ML training validation
# Returns EVERY media item individually (flattened from attached_media arrays)
# Each media asset appears separately with caption, parent context, derivatives
{
  all_media_items {
    # Media identification
    id
    pid
    title
    status
    updated_at
    
    # Media-specific fields
    caption
    attachment_role
    attachment_sequence
    
    # Parent record context (for provenance)
    level
    reference_code
    fonds_code
    series_id
    parent_collection
    scope_and_content
    
    # Dates from parent
    date_begin
    date_end
    
    # Location from parent
    location_repository
    location_accession
    location_box
    
    # DDR context from parent
    ddr_period
    project_theme
    methodology
    epistemic_stance
    
    # Project info from parent
    project_title
    project_job_number
    project_start_date
    project_end_date
    project_duration
    project_outcome
    project_beneficiary_audience
    
    # Creator from parent
    creator_agent_label
    creator_agent
    
    # Funder from parent
    funder_agent_label
    funder_agent
    
    # Corporate creator from parent
    creatorcorporate_id
    
    # Project team from parent (enriched)
    project_team_staff {
      id
      name
      role
      role_description
      department
      tenure
      tenure_start
      tenure_end
      fte_percent
      notes
    }
    
    # Contributors from parent (enriched)
    contributor_agents {
      id
      name
      role
      role_description
      department
      tenure
      tenure_start
      tenure_end
      fte_percent
      notes
    }
    
    # Rights and permissions
    copyright_holder
    copyright_holder_other
    rights_holders
    rights_statement_uri
    takedown_contact
    
    # Language
    language_codes
    
    # Public URIs
    public_uri
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
    
    # Digital assets - JPG derivatives (THIS IS THE KEY DATA)
    jpg_derivatives {
      role
      url
      signed_url
      filename
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    
    # Digital assets - PDF files
    pdf_files {
      role
      url
      signed_url
      filename
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    
    # Digital assets - per-asset ML fields
    digital_assets {
      use_for_ml
      ml_annotation
    }
  }
}

presets.label: Recent items (last 24 hours)
presets.description: Recently updated media items - flattened same as All media items
presets.query:
# Recent media items (last 24 hours) - flattened structure
{
  items_recent(limit: 200) {
    # Core identification
    id
    pid
    title
    status
    updated_at
    
    # Attached media (child records) - these get flattened in UI
    attached_media {
      id
      pid
      title
      status
      caption
      attachment_role
      attachment_sequence
      
      # Digital assets - JPG derivatives
      jpg_derivatives {
        role
        url
        signed_url
        filename
        label
        copyright_holder
        rights_holders
      }
      
      # Digital assets - PDF files
      pdf_files {
        role
        url
        signed_url
        filename
        label
        copyright_holder
        rights_holders
      }
    }
  }
}
